resources.string: Squirtle is a small, water type Pokemon originating from the Kanto region.
Bulbasaur is a small, grass type Pokemon originating from the Kanto region.
Charmander is a small, fire type Pokemon originating from the Kanto region.
Tackle: Deals light damage to opponent. Tail Whip: Reduces defense of opponent by 10%. Water Gun: Deals moderate damage. Increased damage against Charmander. Withdraw: Increases defense by 20%.

Tackle: Deals light damage to opponent. Vine Whip: Deals moderate damage. Increased damage against Squirtle. Growl: Reduces attack power of opponent by 10%. Leech Seed: Deals a small amount of damage each turn, and restores that same amount to itself.
Scratch: Deals light damage to opponent. Rage: Increases attack power ny 20%. Ember: Deals moderate damage. Increased damage against Bulbasaur. Leer: Reduces defense of opponent by 10%.
